Summary 20 years of experience in Accounting and Finance with expertise in financial accounting, planning, reporting, outsourcing, process transformation and re-engineering. During my career to date I have successfully reshaped functions, departments and teams resulting in performance improvement and growth together with the successful implementation of key strategic initiatives.  
 
I have proven management and interpersonal skills with recognised ability to lead, coach and motivate team members, vendors, peers and executives locally, cross functionally and across multiple geographies. 
 
Excellent business acumen and experience in practice, industry and financial services as a member of Chartered Accountants Ireland. Technically up to date on key financial reporting and tax requirements. I am a confident communicator and experienced facilitator for workshops and team strategy setting. Summary A highly self-motivated manager with wide-ranging experience in the areas of software development, project management (PMP certified), account management, customer support and QA in the area of mobile services. With over 10 years of experience in the mobile sector, and deep knowledge of how telcos/carriers in Asia and Europe operate and a good understanding of the systems and processes within these organizations. In depth understanding of the mobile eco-system and how the different players interact.  
 
Have experience working in start-up, R&D and MNC environments and familiar with matrix structure and working with teams both local and remote. Have a proven track record of working with people across cultures and have built cross-border teams with members from Singapore, India, UK, Indonesia and China. Specialties:Project management across US, EU, Asia. Operationalized test pipeline. People management – hired/trained/coached several mobile test teams. Set up and ran outsourced in-market and mobile device testing. Knowledge of SMS/carrier billing protocols, mobile Web and native client (iOS/Android) testing. Developed test frameworks using Perl, TestNG, HTMLUnit/Webdriver. Set up automation for CI (Hudson). Excellent communication skills – conducted training on mobile testing. Fluent in Mandarin. Manager, Quality Engineering Tools and Best Practices Yahoo! January 2013  –  March 2014  (1 year 3 months) United States In charge of test strategy and test tools for Mobile and Emerging Products organization.  
Set up a team of top notch mobile test engineers to support various mobile app teams.

Manage/Coach/Mentor team of 6 mobile test engineers in US/TW. QA Manager – Global Mobile Frontdoors Yahoo! November 2010  –  August 2011  (10 months) Singapore •	In charge of QA team of 5 QA engineers globally in 3 locations: Singapore, London, Delhi 
•	In charge of QA of mobile web frontpage, iPhone app QA Manager (Mobile ICE) APAC/EU Yahoo! December 2009  –  November 2010  (1 year) •	Manage team of 5 QA engineers and testers from 3 locations: Singapore, London, Delhi. 
•	Winner of ICE Hack day – conceived the idea for winning app and led the dev, design and test teams to build and deploy the app.  
•	Conceived, designed and built test framework using TestNG and HTMLUnit for easy test automation setup.

•	Engineering and QA support for integration of ad syndication platform with Maxis, Idea, Hutch (AU)

•	Responsible for demo handset set up for CommunicAsia 2008 and 2009 for Y! Mobile 
•	Yahoo! Superstar Nominee (2008, 2009) Regional QA Manager Yahoo! January 2007  –  December 2008  (2 years) •	Set up QA organization within Yahoo! Connected Life APAC team. This was a regional team for localization testing.  
•	Responsible for QA for Yahoo! mobile products across Singapore, Malaysia, Vietnam, Thailand, Indonesia, , India, Korea, Taiwan, Australia, New Zealand, Hong Kong. Products launched - Yahoo! Go, oneSearch, mobile websites, WAP Mail/Messenger, SMS oneSearch. 
•	Set up test automation framework using Perl WWW::Mechanize for all APAC frontpages, oneSearch localization and subscription services.  
•	Set up outsourced in-market testing framework for carrier testing Yahoo! mobile apps across Asia.  
•	QA responsibilities include supporting 20+ carrier partners in APAC. Presentations made to Globe, Sensis (AU), TNZ among others. 
•	Responsible for demo handset set up for GSMA Asia Mobile Congress in Macau for Y! Mobile

•	Engineering lead for launching SMS services in Vietnam. This required deep involvement in setting up connectivity between SMS aggregator, technical evaluation of aggregator and working with SMS Messenger team to complete the integration.

•	Managed 2 data center migrations for mobile properties.  
•	Set up better monitoring and escalations – this led to improved SMS connectivity with carriers thus leading to doubling of mobile revenue.

I balance the needs and goals of the programs launched in the Americas region with the needs and goals of our product development partners and marketers in Yahoo’s other global regions, supporting international rollouts of launches as necessary. Board Member, Yahoo Employee Foundation (YEF) Yahoo February 2014  – Present (1 year 7 months) Founded by Yahoo employees in 1999 with leadership from David Filo and Jerry Yang, the Yahoo Employee Foundation is a grassroots, philanthropic organization that gives Yahoo employees easy and accessible ways to give back to their communities. 
 
YEF provides Yahoos opportunities to donate time, talent, and money to benefit local non-profit organizations and charities. This occurs in two main ways: 1) throughout the year YEF organizes volunteer events and seasonal donation drives (school backpacks, holiday gifts, etc.); and 2) YEF grants money to nonprofit organizations with programs that address issues of concern to Yahoos.  
 
YEF is 100% employee run by Yahoos who volunteer their time to serve on various committees. The US-based YEF Advisory Board is currently comprised of 17 Yahoos who run the day-to-day operations of YEF and contribute to a wide array of viewpoints to the the direction of the Foundation. Additionally, YEF has committees and chapters in the US, EMEA, India and APAC.
